page.title: 11NORTH ALVES CARAVAN PARK
page.content: Situated one mile north of Alves in 17 acres of landscaped grounds is North Alves Caravan Park. Though set in the quiet Moray countryside the site is close to many amenities such as Roseisle beach ,Elgin and a garage which has hot food carry outs. Site facilities include ,a well stocked shop ,a kiddies playground ,toilets ,games room and two T.V rooms . Being a large caravan site the stands are well spaced out giving you lots of privacy . The site is also equiped with four luxurious static caravans and a lovely little cottage which can be hired . Anyone touring the Moray area should make a point of visiting this very popular site .
